cloudflare.description: AI services powered by Cloudflare Workers AI

builtin.title: Built-in AI Services
builtin.description: Use Cloudflare's built-in AI services without additional configuration

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: Your Cloudflare API key for authentication

@cf/black-forest-labs/flux-1-schnell.description: FLUX.1 [schnell] is a 12 billion parameter rectified flow transformer capable of generating images from text descriptions.

@cf/bytedance/stable-diffusion-xl-lightn.description: SDXL-Lightning is a lightning-fast text-to-image generation model. It can generate high-quality 1024px images in a few steps.

@cf/lykon/dreamshaper-8-lcm.description: Stable Diffusion model that has been fine-tuned to be better at photorealism without sacrificing range.

@cf/runwayml/stable-diffusion-v1-5-img2i.description: Stable Diffusion is a latent text-to-image diffusion model capable of generating photo-realistic images. Img2img generate a new image from an input image with Stable Diffusion.

@cf/runwayml/stable-diffusion-v1-5-inpai.description: Stable Diffusion Inpainting is a latent text-to-image diffusion model capable of generating photo-realistic images given any text input, with the extra capability of inpainting the pictures by using a mask.

@cf/stabilityai/stable-diffusion-xl-base.description: Diffusion-based text-to-image generative model by Stability AI. Generates and modify images based on text prompts.

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: Your OpenAI API key for authentication

baseURL.title: Base URL
baseURL.description: The base URL for OpenAI API endpoint

model.title: Model
model.description: The AI model to use for image generation
model.placeholder: The model to use for image generation

gpt-image-1.description: Gpt-image-1 is a multimodal model that can create images from text or image inputs, with various styles, guidelines, and applications.

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: Your FAL API key for authentication

fal-ai/flux-pro/kontext/max.description: FLUX.1 Kontext [max] is a model with greatly improved prompt adherence and typography generation meet premium consistency for editing without compromise on speed.

fal-ai/flux-pro/kontext.description: FLUX.1 Kontext [pro] handles both text and reference images as inputs, seamlessly enabling targeted, local edits and complex transformations of entire scenes.

fal-ai/qwen-image.description: Qwen-Image is a powerful image generation foundation model capable of complex text rendering and precise image editing.

flux.description: High-quality AI image generation by Black Forest Labs

flux-kontext-pro.description: FLUX.1 Kontext Pro - Advanced image-to-image generation with superior prompt adherence and editing capabilities.

flux-kontext-max.description: FLUX.1 Kontext Max - Premium image-to-image generation with maximum quality and consistency for professional editing.

flux-dev.description: FLUX.1 Dev - High-quality text-to-image generation model optimized for development and experimentation.

flux-pro.description: FLUX.1 Pro - Professional-grade text-to-image generation with excellent prompt adherence and image quality.

flux-pro-1.1.description: FLUX.1 Pro 1.1 - Enhanced version of FLUX Pro with improved performance and quality.

flux-pro-1.1-ultra.description: FLUX.1 Pro 1.1 Ultra - The most advanced FLUX model with ultra-high quality generation and precision.
